all.title: PlayStation 5 raffle
all.howto: Purchase a chance to win a PlayStation 5 console.

day1.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Arena of Generosity
day1.desc: Adventurers must use their weapons, wizardry and wits to survive this gladitorial spectacle. Viewers will be called upon to help tip the odds in the adventurers' favor.
day1.howto: Top fundraisers are eligible to play. Contact donald@kyfrieddice.com if interested. Visit Roll20 to create an account, and return at game time to play. Game is limited to 5 players.

day1.title: Board Game Lounge
day1.desc: Join us for an informal evening playing board games.
day1.howto: Voice chat will be available on our Discord. A free Board Game Arena account is required to play.

day2.title: "Imagine RMHC" Sims Challenge Reveal
day2.desc: Winning entries in the design challenge are revealed by xBasicxWitchx on Twitch.

day2.title: Board Game Lounge
day2.desc: Join us for an informal afternoon playing board games.
day2.howto: Voice chat will be available on our Discord. A free Board Game Arena account is required to play.

day2.title: Golf With Your Friends Invitational
day2.desc: Watch our streamer guests do their best on some increasingly difficult miniature golf holes.

day2.title: Codenames
day2.desc: Spymasters must help their team discover the right cards using single-word clues.
day2.howto: Play online at codenames.game with a "room code" we'll provide. Join us on our Discord to discuss the clues.

day3.title: Caravan of Caring ⋆★Celebrity D&D★⋆
day3.desc: Activate your donor network to help our celebrity Dungeons & Dragons players serve those in need.

day3.title: Closing Ceremony
day3.desc: We'll recognize our fundraising stars and prize winners, celebrate our fundraising total and draw the winner of the PS5 raffle. We finish the evening and Streaming Weekend playing Jackbox games with our Cornerstone audience.
